authorizedCidrs.description: Manage here the list of IP addresses in CIDR format of the clients that can use the API keys.
authorizedCidrs.title: IP address

postLogin.personalDataProtection: Right to the protection of personal data

modal.title: Rotate API Key
modal.description: By rotating this API Key, you deactivate the existing one and generate a new one, with the same attributes.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Monitor all your activities from here.

services.title: Services
services.description: View and manage your institution's services.

keys.title: API Key
keys.description: Use this key for programmatic USE operations of the service.

new-service.title: Create a new service
new-service.description: Follow the steps and fill in the required fields. Once created, you can send the service for review and then proceed to publish it on the IO app.

edit-service.title: Edit the service
edit-service.description: Follow the steps and fill in the required fields. Once modified, you can send the service for review and then proceed to publish it on the IO app.

keys.title: API Keys
keys.description: Here you can manage the API keys to be used to authenticate the institution's requests.

manage.title: API Key Manage
manage.description: Use this key for programmatic operations of creating a new service or updating an existing one.

lifecycle.message: This service is a {{status}} version of an already active IO service.

publication.message: This active service has a {{status}} version.

rejected.message: This service requires modifications before it can be published in the IO app.

reason.label: Read the reasons for refusal here.
reason.title: Reasons for refusal

alerts.submitted: This service is under review. While waiting for the response from our PagoPA team, the service cannot be modified.

modal.title: Do you want to delete this service permanently?
modal.description: By deleting this service, it will no longer be visible in the IO app and will no longer be usable in this reserved area. This action is irreversible.

logo.disclaimerText:
Insert only your institution logo.
You will be responsible for inserting images other than the one indicated.

modal.title: Do you want to publish this service in the IO app?
modal.description: Citizens will see it in the “Services” section of the app, under the name of your institution. You can hide it at any time.

modal.title: Do you want to send this service for review?
modal.description: The service will be reviewed by the IO team. You will receive a communication with the outcome, positive or negative, on the email of the institution and the user who sent the service for review.

modal.title: Do you want to hide this service from the IO app?
modal.description: Citizens will no longer see it in the “Services” section of the app, under the name of your institution. You can publish it again at any time.
